mapper.sql: seq , id , password , nickname , emailAccount , (SELECT cdName FROM code AS d WHERE d.cdSeq = m.emailDomain) AS emailDomain , (SELECT CASE WHEN gender = 4 THEN '남성' WHEN gender = 5 THEN '여성' ELSE '기타' END FROM code AS d WHERE d.cdSeq = m.gender) AS gender , age , agreeDT , delNy
FROM user AS m WHERE 1=1 AND emailDomain = m.emailDomain AND gender = m.gender AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
